attributes.action: Stop Neglecting University Students - We Need our Tuition Fees Gone
attributes.additional_details:
University students need to be given the chance to raise their concerns. COVID 19 is impacting everyones lives, including US, university students but we are not being thought of. 
We are still paying tuition fees, we are still paying accommodation rent, and for what?
We are not being looked after and this needs to stop now. Why cancel all the other exams but leave us to still do ours? Why only mention college, secondary and primary school rules but nothing about universities?
Can you include us?
attributes.background: The Government need to start including the thought of University students in their debates regarding education. University students cannot be neglected by Parliament. Our future is on the line and no one is taking care of it. We are the future of our country and we are being pushed aside.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand you're concerned about the situation for university students during Covid-19, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Implement support for university students during Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554299

Reimburse student rents for all accommodation not used during this academic year
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560735

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516
